name: Boaz Ma'uda
description:
'''Boaz Ma'uda''' ({{langx|he|בועז מעודה}}; born April 23, 1987) is an Israeli singer and songwriter. He won the fifth season of ''[[Kokhav Nolad]]'', the Israeli version of ''[[Pop Idol]]'', and represented [[Israel in the Eurovision Song Contest 2008]], finishing in 9th place.

His voice has been described as somewhere between [[David D'Or]] and [[Dana International]].
